channel.title: prefix-sum on Luma's Shoka
channel.description: Recent content in prefix-sum on Luma's Shoka

item.title: CF706B - Interesting Drink
item.description: CF706B - Interesting Drink Let $c[max(x)]$ array such that $a[x]$ is the number of $x$. Let $s[max(x)]$ be the prefix sum of $c[max(x)]$ given by $$s[i] = s[i-1] + c[i]$$ with $s[1] = c[1]$.
